training.title: Training Modules
training.subtitle: Training & Development
training.description: Enhance your skills with our curated training resources
training.noModulesMessage: No training modules match your search criteria.
training.notifyMessage: We'll notify you when this module becomes available!

aodaTraining.title: AODA Training - Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act
aodaTraining.description: Learn about Ontario's AODA legislation requiring organizations to follow accessibility standards. This mandatory training covers the 2005 law that makes Ontario the first province with such groundbreaking accessibility legislation, with a goal of full accessibility by 2025.

workplaceViolenceHarassment.title: Workplace Violence & Harassment Prevention
workplaceViolenceHarassment.description: Essential training on recognizing, preventing, and addressing workplace violence and harassment. Learn about physical aggression, bullying, intimidation, verbal abuse, and sexual harassment. This mandatory training covers prevention strategies, reporting procedures, and support systems to create safe work environments.

whmisTraining.title: WHMIS Training
whmisTraining.description: Workplace Hazardous Materials Information System training for safe handling of hazardous materials

healthSafetyTraining.title: Health & Safety Training
healthSafetyTraining.description: Comprehensive workplace health and safety protocols to ensure a safe working environment

effectiveResumeScreening.title: Effective Resume Screening
effectiveResumeScreening.description: Best practices for efficiently screening resumes and identifying top candidates

interviewTechniques.title: Interview Techniques
interviewTechniques.description: Advanced interviewing techniques for accurate candidate assessment

clientManagementEssentials.title: Client Management Essentials
clientManagementEssentials.description: Essential strategies for managing client relationships effectively

jobSeekerResumeBuilding.title: Job Seeker Resume Building
jobSeekerResumeBuilding.description: Tips and techniques for creating an effective resume that stands out

personalInfo.sectionDescription: Please provide your basic personal information. Fields marked with * are required.
personalInfo.additionalInfoDescription: The following fields are optional but may be required for certain positions.
personalInfo.dobNote: Must be at least 18 years old and cannot be in the future
personalInfo.emailNote: Email cannot be changed as it's used as a unique identifier for this profile.
personalInfo.mobileNote: Mobile number cannot be changed as it's used as a unique identifier for this profile.
personalInfo.licenseOrPassportRequired: Either a license number or passport number is required
personalInfo.sinNumberNote: Enter a valid 9-digit Canadian SIN using numbers only (no spaces or dashes). This information is encrypted and securely stored.
personalInfo.sinExpiryRequired: SIN Expiry is required if SIN is provided

address.sectionDescription: Please provide your current address. All fields are required.

qualifications.sectionDescription: Please provide your qualifications and work preferences. Fields marked with * are required.

qualifications.bioMaxLength: Bio must be 500 characters or less

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Access and generate various reports to gain insights into your organization. Select a report type below to get started.

weeklyTimesheet.title: Weekly Timesheet
weeklyTimesheet.description: View and export weekly timesheet summaries for all users.

deductionReport.title: Deduction Report
deductionReport.description: Review and export deduction details for payroll and compliance.

invoiceReport.title: Invoice Report
invoiceReport.description: Generate and review invoice reports for clients and jobseekers.

salesReport.title: Sales Report
salesReport.description: Analyze sales data and trends across your organization.

rateList.title: Rate List
rateList.description: View and export the current rate list for all services and positions.

marginReport.title: Margin Report
marginReport.description: Review margin analysis and profitability across clients and services.

envelopePrinting.title: Envelope Printing (Position Details)
envelopePrinting.description: Print envelopes with detailed position information for selected users.

clients.title: Clients
clients.description: View and export client lists and details.
